EmailTemplate.name: July Digest 2017.July Spring Invite 7-6-17
EmailTemplate.subject: 7/13 Webinar: Full Stack Reactive NoSQL: Spring Data and Couchbase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
june 6, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]> Full Stack Reactive NoSQL: Spring Data and Couchbase matt ingenthron & Subhashni Balakrishnan, Couchbase july 13, 2017 11:00am pdt / 2:00pm EDT
In this session we will first review the capabilities of Spring Data Couchbase showing how the implementation makes it easy to leverage a reactive core for your apps. Then we will demonstrate how you can directly work with Couchbase's reactive interface in apps built on the Spring Framework 4.0â€”this will give you a sense of how Couchbase will go even further with Spring Framework 5.0's reactive interfaces.
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jul-13-full-stack-reactive-nosql-spring-data-and-couchbase-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-digest-s&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-couchbase_q217]]>
